items.title: Instant Results

howItWorks.heading: How It Works

items.title: Upload Image
items.description: Drag and drop your photo or select files directly. We support JPG, PNG, and WebP.

items.title: AI Enhancement
items.description: Our sophisticated AI sharpens details and enhances colors while maintaining the photo's integrity.

items.title: Download Result
items.description: View the transformed photo with our comparison slider and download your enhanced image.

items.name: Emily Carter

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to common inquiries about our eye enhancement features

items.title: What features does the eye enhancement provide?
items.description: The enhancement boosts eye colors, brightens the whites, sharpens details, and adds vibrancy, all while preserving the natural appearance.

items.title: Is WaveSpeed completely free to use?
items.description: Absolutely! Each user gets 30 free enhancements daily, allowing you to elevate numerous images. You can also earn extra credits through challenges.

items.title: Can I use enhanced images commercially?
items.description: Yes, paid subscribers can use enhanced images for commercial purposes. Free-tier users are limited to personal projects.

items.title: How does the privacy protection work?
items.description: All eye enhancements are processed securely in your browser. Your photos are never uploaded or stored, ensuring complete privacy.

footer.heading: Ready to Elevate Your Eyes?
footer.description: Try WaveSpeed AI now and see the transformation for yourself. No sign-up required.
